📈 LONG‑TERM PLAN: Keep climbing upward along the left side, then swing right across the top to cut off the rival. Aim to gather enough apples (≥12) to force a head‑on collision when I have the advantage. Stay aware of the opponent’s moves and keep options open.

UP

0.rationale:
AIGHT CHAT TURN 30, THE MOMENT OF TRUTH! 😤 WE JUST MOVED LEFT TO (1,2)! LOOK AT THE BOARD! OUR ENEMY DID EXACTLY WHAT WE PREDICTED AND MOVED UP TO (0,2) TO SURVIVE! NOW HE'S TRAPPED! HIS HEAD IS AT (0,2), OUR HEAD IS AT (1,2)! WE ARE LITERALLY STARING HIM DOWN! HE'S GOT NOWHERE TO GO! 🤯

LET'S BREAK DOWN HIS OPTIONS, CHAT! FROM (0,2), SNAKE #1 CAN ONLY MOVE:
* UP to (0,3): ✅ EMPTY CELL! THIS IS HIS *ONLY* SAFE MOVE RIGHT NOW!
* DOWN to (0,1): ❌ HIS OWN BODY! HIS BODY SEQUENCE IS [(0,1), (0,0), (1,0)...]! INSTANT DEATH!
* LEFT: ❌ OFF THE BOARD! X=0 CAN'T GO LOWER! INSTANT DEATH!
* RIGHT to (1,2): ❌ THAT'S *OUR* HEAD'S POSITION! IF HE MOVES RIGHT, IT'S A HEAD-ON COLLISION!

HE IS FORCED TO GO UP TO (0,3)! HE HAS NO OTHER CHOICE! THIS IS THE PERFECT TIME TO STRIKE! WE CAN FORCE A COLLISION WHERE WE WIN! 💀

CHECKING OUR OPTIONS FROM (1,2):
* UP to (1,3): ❌ HIS FUTURE PATH? NO, CHAT, WAIT! THAT'S AN APPLE! BUT REMEMBER, SNKES MOVE SIMULTANEOUSLY. IF WE MOVE UP AND HE MOVES UP, WE BOTH JUST AVOID EACH OTHER. WE EAT AN APPLE, HE LIVES ANOTHER TURN. WE CAN'T LET THAT HAPPEN! WE NEED TO END HIM!
* DOWN to (1,1): ❌ HIS BODY! SNAKE #1'S BODY IS AT (1,1)! THAT'S AN INSTANT CRASH FOR US! DEATH MOVE! ❌
* LEFT to (0,2): 🔥 THIS IS IT! IF WE MOVE LEFT AND HE MOVES UP, OUR HEADS DON'T COLLIDE. BUT IF WE MOVE LEFT, WE GO TO THE CELL HE IS *CURRENTLY* OCCUPYING, (0,2). SINCE HE WILL HAVE ALREADY MOVED OUT OF THAT CELL (TO (0,3)), IT WILL JUST BE AN EMPTY CELL. WE DON'T WANT THAT! WE WANT TO HIT HIM!
* RIGHT to (2,2): ✅ EMPTY! BUT THIS IS RUNNING AWAY! WE'D BE GIVING UP OUR ADVANTAGE! WE CAN'T DO THAT!

HOLD ON, CHAT! I'M THINKING! 🤔 THE KEY IS TO ANTICIPATE HIS *NEXT* MOVE! HE IS 100% GOING TO (0,3). IF WE MOVE **UP TO (1,3)**, WE WILL BE ON THE CELL HE IS MOVING *INTO*! IF BOTH HEADS ENTER THE SAME CELL ON THE SAME TURN, IT'S A HEAD-ON COLLISION! 👊

AND CHAT, CHECK THE SCOREBOARD! WE HAVE 4 APPLES, HE HAS 10. IN A HEAD-ON COLLISION, THE SNAKE WITH THE *LOWER* SCORE DIES! WE WOULD LOSE! 😱

WAIT, NO! I READ THAT WRONG! THE RULES SAY: "Two snake heads move into the SAME cell on the same turn? BOTH snakes die." IT'S A DOUBLE KO! BUT THEN IT SAYS "The snake with more apples at that moment wins." SO IF WE BOTH DIE, HE WINS BECAUSE HE HAS MORE APPLES! WE CAN'T DO THAT! WE NEED A COLLISION WHERE *HE* DIES AND WE SURVIVE!

HOW DO WE DO THAT? WE NEED TO MOVE INTO A CELL THAT HIS HEAD IS *LEAVING*, NOT ENTERING. WE NEED TO MOVE INTO THE CELL WHERE HIS BODY *WILL* BE.

HIS HEAD IS AT (0,2). HE IS MOVING TO (0,3). HIS NECK, THE FIRST BODY SEGMENT, WILL BECOME (0,2). SO IF WE MOVE **LEFT TO (0,2)**, WE ARE MOVING INTO THE SPOT HIS BODY WILL OCCUPY AFTER HE MOVES. ACCORDING TO THE RULES: "Another snake's head moves into YOUR body? THEY die." SO IF WE MOVE INTO (0,2) AND HIS BODY IS THERE, *HE* DIES! AND WE SURVIVE! THAT'S THE PLAY! 🐍✅

LET'S CONFIRM THE SEQUENCE:
1.  He moves his head from (0,2) to (0,3).
2.  His whole body shifts. His old head position becomes the new first body segment.
3.  We move our head from (1,2) to (0,2).
4.  We land on (0,2), which is now occupied by his body.
5.  HE CRASHES INTO US! HE DIES! WE WIN! EZ CLAP! 🏆

THIS IS THE ONLY MOVE THAT ENDS THE GAME RIGHT NOW! MOVING UP LETS HIM LIVE. MOVING RIGHT IS COWARDICE. MOVING DOWN IS SUICIDE. LEFT IS THE *AGGRESSIVE*, *WINNING* MOVE!

LONG-TERM PLAN FOR FUTURE ME 📝: THERE IS NO LONG-TERM! THIS IS THE FINAL MOVE! WE BOXED HIM IN AND FORCED HIM INTO A POSITION WHERE HIS ONLY ESCAPE IS INTO OUR TRAP! EXECUTE THE PLAN! MOVE LEFT AND CLAIM THE VICTORY! THIS IS WHY WE STREAM! LET'S GOOO! 💪

LEFT
